extendedInfo.description: The Future Shop App for Android offers Canadians the most seamless mobile shopping experience. Use the lightning-fast search engine to shop our entire catalogue, get product info, read reviews and ratings, check specifications, and access hundreds of Tech Spotlight articles on the hottest tech products. Make your purchase from your Android smartphone for delivery anywhere in Canada or pick up your reserved order in store. The App also lets you save products and manage your shopping cart right from your phone. Get driving directions to your closest store, via the built-in GPS feature, or find a Future Shop store by entering your postal code in our store locator.This free App is compatible with all generations of Android. Features of the Future Shop Android App include: â¢	Browse and search a variety of products with detailed specs and picturesâ¢	Find the latest, hottest items on saleâ¢	A desktop widget alerts you when your favourite items go on saleâ¢	Browse the weekly flyer for the best dealsâ¢	Check stock levels in-store and online right from the appâ¢	Rate and review products directly from your Android deviceâ¢	Make purchases quickly with our faster, more robust checkout processâ¢	Get the stuff that you want faster with Reserve and Pick Upâ¢	Use geo-location to find a store close to youâ¢	Scan QR codes to get more information about productsâ¢	Save products to Favourites and come back to them  laterâ¢	Join hundreds of tech discussions in our Tech Forumâ¢	Get daily tech insights from those in the know at Tech Blog

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Works fine, some items do not come up in the barcode scanner but generally that\'s an excellent feature.  You can shop by category and they are quite specific so it\'s easy to find and compare items before you go looking all over the shelves.  Would be great if it was integrated with their website - there\'s no link to one\'s online account so you have two separate shopping carts, favorite lists, etc.
reviews.author: William Foran

reviews.title: Pretty useless
reviews.comment: Worst then their website.  Flyers never works.  Only thing that works is buying something.  No features.  Completly useless app.
reviews.author: Ben Lam

reviews.title: Not as good as you would think.
reviews.comment: very laggy, searching won\'t always work data errors when data is off
reviews.author: Kyle Germuth

reviews.title: Crash, crash, crash
reviews.comment: Load more option more often than out does not do anything. App crashes a lot. Uninstall was the best working feature.
reviews.author: Don Hunter

reviews.title: Please fixx
reviews.comment: On my lg optimus 2x  Whenever I click on sale on whatever I am searching it immeditly forces close!!!!
reviews.author: Hamza Kanth

reviews.title: Download to sd card
reviews.comment: U guys need to download  to sd card in sted of the moible devices
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Crashed multiple times when searching. An awful experience.
reviews.author: Jason Takhar

reviews.title: Not holo compliant
reviews.comment: This app does not follow android holo guideline... Uninstalling
reviews.author: Keven G\303\251linas

reviews.comment: Crashes repeatedly
reviews.author: Michel Lavoie

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: I can see products and their prices so that\'s 1 star.  The filtering is broken, it looks like crap and doesn\'t fit in with the holo theme at all. There is no reason to have a button that says show more, just give me an infinite scroll like every other app out there.  I\'d rather read through fliers rather than use this app.
reviews.author: Rudolf Olah

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: Uninstall. Doesn\'t even work. Categories don\'t match up with products (I.e. games category display cell phones not games) just extra bloatware on your phone. Just an iPhone port. Don\'t even consider it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete trash
reviews.comment: No matter how I filter my search I always end up with bluerays.  Flyer always reports no items found.  I would expect more from a store with \"future\" in the name in a app.  Pretty bad when Canadian Tires app is far superior then Future Shops POS app.
reviews.author: James Keenan

reviews.title: Mediocre at best
reviews.comment: Why do I need desperate APS for best buy Canada and Future  Shop? We all know you are the same company. Why is your app so slow to update? And search so bad?
reviews.author: Charles Gauthier

reviews.title: Super easy to use
reviews.comment: This makes checking out and actually buying products super fast and easy. Huge fan.
reviews.author: Taylor Sharpe

reviews.title: Waste of time installing
reviews.comment: Have a Galaxy S Infuse. All I get is a data error. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: Fred Berni

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its decent, I find what im looking for, essentially a downloadable version of thr mobile site
reviews.author: Rayan Osseiran

reviews.comment: A bit slow, but gets the job done when I\'m checking for the price of something.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad until update
reviews.comment: App can\'t decide if it wants to work or not, leaning towards not since the update a few days back. Fix please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow with lots of bugs
reviews.comment: Waiting forever to see what\'s on sale. Very frustrating user experience.
reviews.author: Carol Tse

reviews.title: Feels like a clunky iOS port
reviews.comment: Feels like a clunky iOS port
